mapper.insert: insert into board_table(boardName, boardTitle, boardOccupation, boardDemploymentType,boardMoney, boardPersonnel, boardWorkeriod, boardWorkDays, boardWorktime, boardGender, boardAge, boardEducation, boardDeadline, boardContext, boardEnterPriseName, boardAddress, boardManagerName, boardEmail, boaardMobile) values (#{boardName},#{boardTitle},#{boardOccupation},#{boardDemploymentType},#{boardMoney}, #{boardPersonnel},#{boardWorkeriod},#{boardWorkdDays},#{boardWorktime}, #{boardGender},#{boardAge},#{boardEducation},#{boardDeadline}, #{boardContext}, #{boardEnterPriseName},#{boardAddress},#{boardMangerName},#{boardEmail}, #{boardMobile})
